mainHero.title: The Hex Project
mainHero.subtitle: Professional sound hire
mainHero.description: UK based, professional audio rental company providing scalable Element 5 systems to suit your events needs

product.title: Our Equipment
product.description: The Element 5 Hex range of speakers has been designed from the ground up to deliver the highest possible volume and sound quality from a lightwight package with an incredibly small footprint. Not only do these speakers sound spectacular, but they also look the part, with a contemporary hexagonal styling to help distinguish your event audio from the rest. We are currently the only audio hire hire company officring this uniquely distinctive sound system.

items.title: HEX 68R
items.description: The revolutionary HEX 68R combines a point source/array into a single enclosure solution. Using Element 5 Systems unique ribbon array design, these speakers provide crystal clear and beautifully accurate sound. These speakers will be sure to capture the imagination of your audience.

items.title: HEX RB218
items.description: The RB218 is a compact and lightwuight dual 18" reflex subwoofer delivering an abundance of warm and tight low end which is highly controllable using multiple cardioid configurations. This enables the client to effectively control sound overspill both on and off site.

items.title: LINEA RESEARCH AMPLIFICATION
items.description: Offering a unique and peerless audio performance integrated with an intelligent DSP, the 44M and 48M Series represents an unmatched advancement in amplifier technology.
items.one: Over designed high capacity power supplies

features.title: Other services we provide
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
features.description: It is also possible for us to source other Element 5 equipment which is not currently currently in our inventory. We also have a considerable amount of Martin Audio sound equipment available for hire alongside a selection of up to date DJ and monitoring equipment. working together with our partners, we can provide exciting talent including:

items.title: Who is the Hex Project
items.description: The Hex Project is a new UK based, professional audio rental company providing scalable Element 5 systems to suit your event needs. Whether it be a festival, club night, corporate event or a wedding, offering true sonic quality is our priority. We are a collective of like-minded individuals who have come together to provide high quality aidio solutions. Working with our partners we can also offer event/stage packages to match the client's vision.
items.thirdBulletPoint: Tailor made event package working with pur partners

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
